modules.description: This module represents and manipulates BNF-style grammars using symbolic structures. It defines symbols (terminal, nonterminal, repeat), rules with weighted alternatives, and supports grammar reduction operations. Use it to generate or transform structured text like programming languages, configuration formats, or data serialization schemas.

This module processes BNF grammars, enabling parsing from strings, files, or channels and generating structured output based on defined rules. It supports symbolic grammar representation with terminals, nonterminals, and weighted alternatives, allowing transformations and reductions. You can validate grammars, control generation settings like debug output, and generate test inputs or sample data for languages and formats. Use it to build, manipulate, and execute BNF-based grammars for parser testing or data generation workflows.
